description: Here’s another threesome coming your way with hotties Blake, Jayden and Porter! These three guys are really fun to be around. Not only do they get along and joke around like old buddies, but they also have great sexual chemistry! Blake went to pick Jayden and Porter up, and what started as friendly reminiscing in the car, quickly turned into kissing and groping…they just couldn’t wait! Blake quickly told the boys exactly what he wanted, “My goal today is I wanna get in the middle…Where I’m getting fucked, I don’t care who’s fucking me, and I’m fucking! That’s all I want out of today!” Jayden and Porter affirmed the request, “I think we can make that happen!” Jayden then expressed something on his wish list, “You know what I’ve always wanted to do is put my dick and another guy’s dick in one hole.” Porter raised his hand, “Me!” All three guys got exactly what they wanted, and more! All that sex talk got these studs really horned up, so Blake put the pedal to the metal to start this thing!
title: Blake, Jayden & Porter: Bareback
